title: Always DYOR before investing… #crypto #bitcoin #celsius #cryptoscam #ytshorts #fypシ
transcript: How did Celsius go from unbank yourself to bankruptcy and fraud charges? Inside the company, the financial strain [music] was mounting. Celsius wasn't generating enough revenue to cover its massive yield promises. So, it started taking [music] riskier bets, including unsecured loans and speculative DeFi positions. The examiner's report called its business ponzylike, saying Celsius had likely been insolvent since inception.
